item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @King_Of_Eggbeans King Of Eggbeans
item.description:
@King_Of_Eggbeans wrote:

[b]Recently, I was configuring the Enviroment Variables, and I kinda’ mucked it up.
I changed the 'PATH & ‘CLASSPATH’ on the System Variables down the bottom, now I can’t run any clients, and all the java is fucked.

I also get;

‘Java’ is not recognized as a internal or external command’.[/b]

Read full topic
